thread.section_title: Elara Online Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elara Online | www.elara.ie
thread.title: Joshua Pierpont
thread.title_full: Elara Online reviewed by Joshua Pierpont

author: Joshua Pierpont
title: Joshua Pierpont
text:
Easy and fast shopping experience! Had exactly what I was looking for at a great price.
The website was easy to navigate on my mobile, and product descriptions were very complete as well as informative.
Once my purchase was completed, I was also very happy with the level of email contact. I was kept updated about my order status and was very swiftly supplied with tracking information. Shipping was very fast!
I will definitely be returning and will also be recommending Elara to any of my friends and family who need electronic and computer supplies
